title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;

Made with a durable stainless steel blade and a comfortable PP handle, it is designed to effortlessly clean ice and frost from your fridge. 

The scraper comes in three attractive colors - blue, gray, and pink - allowing you to choose the one that matches your style. With a compact size of 17x4.5 cm, it is easy to store and handle.

Each package includes 1 Fridge Ice Scraper, ensuring you have everything you need to tackle those stubborn ice build-ups. The measurement deviation of 1-5mm guarantees precision in removing ice, while the color variation notice reminds you that the actual color may vary slightly due to monitor and lighting conditions.
